New blog, lighter, faster, using real technology

Published the 15 January 2013 by Thomas Romera

Hello, just to tell you that this is the new version of my blog, without this WordPress sucking all the shared server resources.

Seriously, it’s really a heavy solution, I don’t want to rent a dedicated server only for my blog. I need something more personal, faster, cheaper, and stronger.

So, I’m now using Jekyll, (thanks Julien !), and for free, use the GitHub page. Jekyll compile all your pages to give you a “static” site. So, I don’t need PHP, I don’t need a database. And, it’s coded in RUBY !

Here is a semi technique article to more describe Jekyll : How Jekyll Rock (With Style)

I will also give you a little talk about Foundation, a Framework for responsive design. I’m bored by Bootstrap and it documentation, really not developer-friendly, on my opinion.

Stay tuned !
